text:
Everyone's turn will be from the next segment.
Are you all ready?

Playing maids together... it's quite
a rare opportunity, isn't it?

Yeah yeah! I'm all set!
It's just a shame the segment is short...!
Haha, looks like you're all pumped up.

...The chocolate cakes and baked goods
recommended on the show...

They were so lovely,
and they looked delicious...

If we can convey the charm of cakes and pastries
with all our might...!
